titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd at the funerals of that worthy personage George Purefoy the elder of Wadley in Berks, esq., who was buried by his ancestors at Drayton in Leicestershire, April 21, 1661 by Jo. Hinckley.
titleStmt.author: Hinckley, John, 1617?-1695.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
